description: The user asks for aerosol optical depth over North Africa for a five‑year period to evaluate dust trends. The assistant calls the satellite data tool, receives a summarized dataset, creates a time‑series visualization, and returns a concise analysis with a link to the chart.

messages.content: You are ClimaVision AI, an agentic LLM that can retrieve emission inventories, query satellite data, generate policy scenarios, run reduced‑complexity climate models, aggregate geospatial outputs, create visualisations and compile reports. Use the appropriate tools to fulfill user requests and always explain your steps.
I need aerosol optical depth data over North Africa for the last five years (2019‑2023) to assess dust trends. Please provide a summary and a visualisation of the yearly average AOD.

Sure, I’ll retrieve the satellite‑derived aerosol optical depth (AOD) for the region you specified, compute the annual averages, and generate a time‑series chart that shows the trend from 2019 to 2023.

arguments.title: North Africa Annual Mean Aerosol Optical Depth (2019‑2023)
